original_text:
Their tongue is a deadly arrow;
    it speaks deceitfully.
With their mouths they all speak cordially to their neighbors,
    but in their hearts they set traps for them.
korean_text: 그들의 혀는 죽이는 화살이라 거짓을 말하며 입으로는 그 이웃에게 평화를 말하나 마음으로는 해를 꾸미는도다

sentences.original_text: Their tongue is a deadly arrow;
With their mouths they all speak cordially to their neighbors,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 입으로 이웃에게 모두 친절하게 말하며

sentences.original_text: but in their hearts they set traps for them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들의 마음속에서는 그들을 위한 덫을 놓는다
